aka: Love Under the Sign of the Dragon
this_title: Eine Liebe im Zeichen des Drachen
trans_title: Love Under the Sign of the Dragon
introduction: In Singapore, successful businessman Alexander falls in love with his new assistant Li Lin. Their love is soon put to test when his ex-fiancée Anna's brother blackmails Li Lin into stealing the plans for Alexander's project. Li Lin reluctantly succumbs to the pressure. Meanwhile, Anna meets Li Lin by chance and soon their friendship develops and endures even after Anna discovers Li Lin's love for Alexander. When Alexander forgives Li Lin, Anna bravely decides to allow destiny to follow its own course.
chinese_title: Eine Liebe im Zeichen des Drachen
